title: Change currency from dollar to Indian Rupee (INR)

requirements.summary: Replace all dollar sign ($) currency symbols with Indian Rupee symbol (₹) throughout the frontend application
acceptanceCriteria: All instances of '$' are replaced with '₹' in the UI
No dollar symbols remain visible in any frontend component

file_operations.description: Replace dollar sign ($) with Indian Rupee symbol (₹) in service price input field placeholder and display. Update currency formatting to use INR conventions (₹1,234.56 format) in the services section where prices are shown.
Replace dollar sign ($) with Indian Rupee symbol (₹) in laborer card service price displays. Update price formatting to use INR conventions throughout the laborer listings.
Replace dollar sign ($) with Indian Rupee symbol (₹) in booking detail service price displays. Ensure all price-related information shows INR symbol and formatting.
Replace dollar sign ($) with Indian Rupee symbol (₹) in service price display for the selected service. Update any price-related labels or information to use INR symbol and formatting conventions.

requirements.summary: Update all price input fields and displays across ProfilePage.tsx, CreateBookingPage.tsx, BookingDetailPage.tsx, and DiscoveryPage.tsx to show INR symbol (₹) and use appropriate INR formatting
acceptanceCriteria: Price input fields display ₹ prefix or INR label
Price displays use ₹ symbol throughout the application
Number formatting follows Indian numbering system conventions where appropriate

file_operations.description: Update service price input fields to show ₹ prefix or INR label. Ensure input validation and display formatting uses INR conventions. Update placeholder text and labels to indicate INR currency.
Update service price displays in laborer cards to consistently use ₹ symbol with proper INR number formatting. Ensure all price-related text consistently shows INR formatting.
Update booking detail page to display service prices with ₹ symbol and INR formatting conventions throughout the booking information section.
Update service price display in booking creation form to show ₹ symbol with proper INR formatting. Ensure price information is clearly formatted as INR currency.
